attributes.action: a series of Design Competitions in each city and town in UK
attributes.additional_details:
-I wish to propose a series of UK Students Design Competitions to run consecutively in each major town and city in UK, to provide an interactive opportunity to all architecture/design/fashion/art University students in UK to get involved ‘hands on’ in taking part in a competition to offer their input and participation to provide their prepared Application  and present a Cultural Storyboard which will visually translate how they propose to make a creative difference to their area -whether students choose one particular street, a local square, or a selection of shops or offices/exteriors.stopress1@yahoo.com
www.skype.com mediaqueen2
